snippet: The president's spokesman says the White House is not focusing on the re-election campaign. His schedule, at least for one day, suggests otherwise.
abstract: The president's spokesman says the White House is not focusing on the re-election campaign. His schedule, at least for one day, suggests otherwise.
lead_paragraph: Since President Obama's return from Hawaii last week, the White House has labored to dispel any notion that he is plunging into his re-election campaign. Mr. Obama, his press aides say, did not watch the New Hampshire primary returns, nor did he schedule a jobs event at the White House on Wednesday as a riposte to Republican charges that he hasn't created enough of them.
